QueryText: Control of Grey leaf blight in Coconut

KccAns: Spray the crown with 025 per cent copper oxychloride or 1 per cent Bordeaux mixture before the onset of rains
Application of extra 15kg of Potash Pseudomonas fluorescence 200gCowdung 5kg tree Removed burning of affected leaves
Application of extra 15kg of Potash Pseudomonas fluorescence 200gCowdung 5kg tree Removed burning of affected leaves
Recommended to spray Copper Oxychloride  600 g per 200 litre of water per 1 acre of land
